title: 怎么制作挂机池可刷经验？
author: Xing_Hen_FuZhu
txt_content:
怎么制作挂机池可刷经验？ 还有坐在椅子上然后挂机能刷经验？
需要脚本方块插件还是???

replies.author: Deeplovelyx
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {EntityId:XPOrb,
SpawnCount:1,
SpawnRange:2,
RequiredPlayerRange:6,
Delay:A,
MinSpawnDelay:A,
MaxSpawnDelay:A,
MaxNearbyEntities:5,
SpawnData:{Value:B}
}

A处换成刷经验的延迟(1秒=20)
B处换成一次刷经验的点数
然后复制进入命令方块即可
